title: 删除链表中的节点 (Delete Node in a Linked List)
content: 思路: // @Title: 删除链表中的节点 (Delete Node in a Linked List) // @Author: qisiii // @Date: 2022-02-28 20:35:06 // @Runtime: 0 ms // @Memory: 40.8 MB // @comment: // @flag: /** * Definition for singly-linked list. * public class ListNode { * int val; * ListNode next; * ListNode(int x) { val = x; } * } */ class Solution { public void deleteNode(ListNode node) { node.val=node.next.val; node.next=node.next.next; } }
